articles.author: Kyle Melnick
articles.title: Hot frog ‘saunas’ help Australian species fight deadly fungus - The Washington Post
articles.description: Australian researchers found that frogs fought off the chytridiomycosis disease in small sauna-like shelters that retained heat.
articles.content: A fungal infection some scientists consider one of the worst wildlife diseases of all time is wreaking havoc on the global frog population. Now, scientists say theyve discovered a way to help frogs f… [+4857 chars]
